channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: Moonshine: Speech Recognition for Live Transcription and Voice Commands
item.description: This paper introduces Moonshine, a family of speech recognition models optimized for live transcription and voice command processing.

item.title: MaskGCT: Zero-Shot Text-to-Speech with Masked Generative Codec Transformer
item.description: The recent large-scale text-to-speech (TTS) systems are usually grouped as autoregressive and non-autoregressive systems.

item.title: Emilia: An Extensive, Multilingual, and Diverse Speech Dataset for Large-Scale Speech Generation
item.description: To facilitate the scale-up of Emilia, we also present Emilia-Pipe, the first open-source preprocessing pipeline designed to efficiently transform raw, in-the-wild speech data into high-quality training data with speech annotations.

item.title: Mini-Omni2: Towards Open-source GPT-4o with Vision, Speech and Duplex Capabilities
item.description: It can understand visual, auditory, and textual modalities, directly output audio, and support flexible duplex interaction.

item.title: KAG: Boosting LLMs in Professional Domains via Knowledge Augmented Generation
item.description: The recently developed retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) technology has enabled the efficient construction of domain-specific applications.

item.title: DreamClear: High-Capacity Real-World Image Restoration with Privacy-Safe Dataset Curation
item.description: Our second contribution, DreamClear, is a DiT-based image restoration model.

item.title: D-FINE: Redefine Regression Task in DETRs as Fine-grained Distribution Refinement
item.description: When pretrained on Objects365, D-FINE-L / X attains 57. 1% / 59. 3% AP, surpassing all existing real-time detectors.

item.title: Tora: Trajectory-oriented Diffusion Transformer for Video Generation
item.description: The TE encodes arbitrary trajectories into hierarchical spacetime motion patches with a 3D video compression network.

item.title: OmniGen: Unified Image Generation
item.description: In this work, we introduce OmniGen, a new diffusion model for unified image generation.

item.title: LongVU: Spatiotemporal Adaptive Compression for Long Video-Language Understanding
item.description: Given a light-weight LLM, our LongVU also scales effectively into a smaller size with state-of-the-art video understanding performance.

item.title: DocETL: Agentic Query Rewriting and Evaluation for Complex Document Processing
item.description: We introduce {\em (i)} logical rewriting of pipelines, tailored for LLM-based tasks, {\em (ii)} an agent-guided plan evaluation mechanism that synthesizes and orchestrates task-specific validation prompts, and {\em (iii)} an optimization algorithm that efficiently finds promising plans, considering the time constraints of LLM-based plan generation and evaluation.

item.title: LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation
item.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems enhance large language models (LLMs) by integrating external knowledge sources, enabling more accurate and contextually relevant responses tailored to user needs.

item.title: PF3plat: Pose-Free Feed-Forward 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: We then introduce lightweight, learnable modules to refine depth and pose estimates from the coarse alignments, improving the quality of 3D reconstruction and novel view synthesis.

item.title: F5-TTS: A Fairytaler that Fakes Fluent and Faithful Speech with Flow Matching
item.description: This sampling strategy for flow step can be easily applied to existing flow matching based models without retraining.

item.title: Blendify -- Python rendering framework for Blender
item.description: With the rapid growth of the volume of research fields like computer vision and computer graphics, researchers require effective and user-friendly rendering tools to visualize results.

item.title: Grounding Image Matching in 3D with MASt3R
item.description: Image Matching is a core component of all best-performing algorithms and pipelines in 3D vision.

item.title: ServerlessLLM: Low-Latency Serverless Inference for Large Language Models
item.description: This paper presents ServerlessLLM, a distributed system designed to support low-latency serverless inference for Large Language Models (LLMs).

item.title: OGBench: Benchmarking Offline Goal-Conditioned RL
item.description: Despite the importance of this setting, we lack a standard benchmark that can systematically evaluate the capabilities of offline GCRL algorithms.

item.title: Allegro: Open the Black Box of Commercial-Level Video Generation Model
item.description: Significant advancements have been made in the field of video generation, with the open-source community contributing a wealth of research papers and tools for training high-quality models.

item.title: Hallo2: Long-Duration and High-Resolution Audio-Driven Portrait Image Animation
item.description: To the best of our knowledge, Hallo2, proposed in this paper, is the first method to achieve 4K resolution and generate hour-long, audio-driven portrait image animations enhanced with textual prompts.
